thread.title: Getting prisoners life-ready to prevent a return to crime
thread.title_full: Video: Getting prisoners life-ready to prevent a return to crime | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Getting prisoners life-ready to prevent a return to crime
text: How do you make sure prisoners who are released back into society won't commit more crimes? Meet three people living behind bars who are part of a pilot program that tries to prevent recidivism. William Brangham reports.
